how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Nutritive Shampoo:.-Apply a quarter-size amount to wet hair..-Gently massage into scalp and hair until lather..-Rinse thoroughly..-Follow with the Nutritive conditioner .-Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately and thoroughly...Nutritive Conditioner:.-After cleansing hair with Nutritive Shampoo, apply a quarter-size amount to clean, wet hair..-Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends for even distribution..-Leave in hair for two to three minutes, then rinse thoroughly..-Avoid contact with eyes..-If contact occurs, rinse immediately and thoroughly...Nutritive Heat-Protecting Leave-In Spray: .-After shampooing and conditioning, apply a quarter-size amount to clean, towel-dried hair..-Do not rinse..-Massage onto lengths and ends..-Blow-dry or air-dry..-Heat style as usual to achieve the desired look..-Use as a heat protectant before heat styling..-Apply product onto mid-lengths and ends for seamless detangling and frizz reduction for a sleek finish.
